verses.verse: In the Lord <S%H3068><s%> put I my trust <S%H2620><s%>: how say <S%H559><s%> you to my soul <S%H5315><s%>, Flee <S%H5110><s%> as a bird <S%H6833><s%> to your mountain <S%H2022><s%>?

For <S%H7563><s%>, behold, the wicked bend <S%H1869><s%> their bow <S%H7198><s%>, they make ready <S%H3559><s%> their arrow <S%H2671><s%> upon the string <S%H3499><s%>, that they may secretly <S%H652><s%> shoot <S%H3384><s%> at the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%>.
If the foundations <S%H8356><s%> be destroyed <S%H2040><s%>, what can the righteous <S%H6662><s%> do <S%H6466><s%>?

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is in his holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>, the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s throne <S%H3678><s%> is in heaven <S%H8064><s%>: his eyes <S%H5869><s%> behold <S%H2372><s%>, his eyelids <S%H6079><s%> try <S%H974><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> tries <S%H974><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>: but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> and him that loves <S%H157><s%> violence <S%H2555><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> hates <S%H8130><s%>.

Upon the wicked <S%H7563><s%> he shall rain <S%H4305><s%> snares <S%H6341><s%>, fire <S%H784><s%> and brimstone <S%H1614><s%>, and a horrible <S%H2152><s%> storm <S%H7307><s%>: this shall be the portion <S%H4521><s%> of their cup <S%H3563><s%>.
For the righteous <S%H6662><s%> Lord <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%>; his favor <S%H6440><s%> does behold <S%H2372><s%> the upright <S%H3477><s%>.
